name: 神明在上
description:
Diverse Character experience In the 'Zengeon' world, there are different characters to choose from, each with completely different skills and features. The game focuses on the "Action" component of the action role-playing game. You need to make different operations and strategies in real time according to the understanding of different characters, and get a rhythmic and diverse battle in the process of familiarizing with the unique character's experience. Rich prop system On the adventure road you have the opportunity to get a variety of props, each of them has its own unique effect, choose the props you like will bring a rich combination to make the battle journey full of interesting variables, and then match the role Features create your own fighting genre.Rougelike element game experienceThere are no save points in the game, and each round has different fun in the random level challenge and the acquisition of the props. Multi-directional story interpretationEach character in the story has its own exclusive memory, retrieving their memories and finding a journey that belongs to each character.

h2]Multiplayer game[/h2]
The game provides multiplayer game mode. We encourage players to play games with good friends and enjoy the challenge.
